text: Richard Seddon (22 June 1845 â€“ 10 June 1906) was Prime Minister of New Zealand from 1893 through 1906. He is the longest serving Prime Minister of New Zealand. He introduced women's rights for his country in 1893, 25 years before the United Kingdom did. ==References== Category:1845 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of New Zealand
title: Richard Seddon
